Text: One of the best movies I have ever seen! Love james carrey anyway but in this he's fantastic!

Unwatchable on Flatscreen TV with Blu-Ray player,
horrible block-building. Plays fine on PC, but who wants to watch this on a small monitor? Not correctly encoded. Thanks anyway for your effort.
